message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at a price of $9,500. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,500?
Hi Bob, I understand your desire to keep costs down, but my original offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway - how about $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value and features of the product, I believe $8,500 would be a fair price for us both.
